quantity_min.description: The minimum quantity of associated variant in the cart needed to qualify for this tiers pricing.

quantity_max.description: The maximum allowed quantity of associated variant in the cart to qualify for this tiers pricing.

type.description: The type of adjustment that is made. Acceptable values: price – the adjustment amount per product; percent – the adjustment as a percentage of the original price; fixed – the adjusted absolute price of the product.

amount.description: The price adjustment amount. This value along with the type will decide the price per variant for the pricing tier.
